allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Firefox Tab Group Title Copier extension

Features:
- Display all tab groups in popup and sidebar
- Copy all tab titles from any group with one click
- Multi-language support (English, Chinese, Japanese)
- Clean, user-friendly interface

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Add extension ID for Manifest V3 compatibility

- Added browser_specific_settings with gecko.id
- Set minimum Firefox version to 109.0
- Required for Firefox Add-ons submission

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Improve: Update popup title to better reflect core functionality

- Changed from generic "Tab Title Copier" to specific "Copy Tab Group Titles"
- Better communicates the extension''s purpose of copying all titles from tab groups

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
